select
from SYS_USER su left join sys_staff_info ssi on su.USER_ID_ = ssi.USER_ID_ left join sys_account sa on su.USER_ID_ = sa.USER_ID_ left join sys_user_position sup on su.USER_ID_ = sup.USER_ID_ and sup.IS_MAJOR_ = 1 left join sys_position sp on sup.POSITION_ID_ = sp.POSITION_ID_ left join sys_organization so on sp.ORG_ID_ = so.ORG_ID_ left join sys_job sj on sp.JOB_ID_ = sj.JOB_ID_
ORDER BY ${orderStr}
ORDER BY su.USER_ID_ desc

select count( su.USER_ID_ ) as counts from SYS_USER su left join sys_staff_info ssi on su.USER_ID_ = ssi.USER_ID_ left join sys_account sa on su.USER_ID_ = sa.USER_ID_ left join sys_user_position sup on su.USER_ID_ = sup.USER_ID_ and sup.IS_MAJOR_ = 1 left join sys_position sp on sup.POSITION_ID_ = sp.POSITION_ID_ left join sys_organization so on sp.ORG_ID_ = so.ORG_ID_ left join sys_job sj on sp.JOB_ID_ = sj.JOB_ID_

select DATE_FORMAT(a.QUIT_TIME_,'%m') total_month,count(1) total from sys_staff_info a where a.QUIT_TIME_>0 and DATE_FORMAT(a.QUIT_TIME_,'%Y')=#{year} group by DATE_FORMAT(a.QUIT_TIME_,'%m')
select to_char(a.QUIT_TIME_,'MM') total_month,count(1) total from sys_staff_info a where A.QUIT_TIME_ IS NOT NULL and to_char(a.QUIT_TIME_,'yyyy')=#{year} group by to_char(a.QUIT_TIME_,'MM')
select DATE_FORMAT(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'%m') total_month,count(1) total from sys_staff_info a where DATE_FORMAT(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'%Y')=#{year} group by DATE_FORMAT(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'%m')
select to_char(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'MM') TOTAL_MONTH,count(1) TOTAL from sys_staff_info a where to_char(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'yyyy')=#{year} group by to_char(a.ENTRY_TIME_,'MM')
